metadata.title: CVE-2016-1000343 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In the Bouncy Castle JCE Provider version 1.55 and earlier the DSA key pair generator generates a weak private key if used with default values. If the JCA key pair generator is not explicitly initialised with DSA parameters, 1.55 and earlier generates a private value assuming a 1024 bit key size. In earlier releases this can be dealt with by explicitly passing parameters to the key pair generator.

criterions.comment: bouncycastle package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.60-1').
